data.text: Wooi niiti ka Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI dɛɛni ga Amɔse, Tekoa taazuʋɛ logani makɛ nui gila ge ɠɛni de. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni pɔ Izilayɛle laalɔɠɔma, Zuda masagi Woziase ná-siɛgi zu, ta Izilayɛle masagi Zeloɓoame velesiɛi ná-siɛgi zu, Zoase ná-doun zunui. Niima vaiti kɛɛʋɛ kona felegɔ leʋe pɛ, zou ɓalii ʋa ɠɛ.
Nà ʋaazu abui losu Ɠazayɛle ná-pɛlɛyeɠei ʋa,
Nà Damase taai ma ɓogiti galeɠale da,
Nà ʋaazu abui losu Gaza ziɠigi ʋa,
Nà ʋaazu abui losu Tiil ziɠigi ʋa,
Nà ʋaazu abui losu Teman taai ʋa,
Nà ʋaazu abui losu Laɓa ziɠigi ʋa,
